overview: How long has it been since you last checked your phone?  5 minutes? 1 minute? 10 seconds? Did you imagine that last vibration? In 2021, that smart phone of yours - is a fixture of you - and for many in our world, they donâ€™t even know escape is an option. Digital addiction is a hidden illness among us, and it has our society in a vice grip.
title: Tethered, Are We the Experiment?
